Amazon Web Services Vietnam Company Limi.ID: Amazon Web Services Vietnam Company Limited - E42@Analytics Specialist Solutions Architect - ASEAN
Amazon Web Services Vietnam Company Limi.company: Amazon Web Services Vietnam Company Limited - E42
Amazon Web Services Vietnam Company Limi.job_description: Bachelors degree 7+ years of hands-on implementation and architecture experience in data warehousing, data lakes, operational analytics, data migration, data governance, and integration scenarios, with a deep understanding of Apache Hadoop and the Hadoop ecosystem, and experience in tools/technologies/languages such as SQL, Python, Hive, Kafka, Spark, Flink, and Presto. Proven track record of success in a consultative technical sales or professional services role, with the ability to gain credibility and build relationships with all levels in an organization, from technical experts to senior executives. Demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges in an enterprise environment, with a track record of thought leadership and innovation around Big Data. Strong verbal and written communication skills, the ability to lead effectively across internal and external organizations and distributed teams, and a talent for influencing and building mind-share convincingly with any audience, including experience in public speaking to large audiences.  Are you an experienced Big Data Solutions Architect? Do you like to solve the most complex and high-scale data challenges in the world today? Would you like a career that gives you opportunities to help customers and partners use cloud computing and big data technologies to achieve the highest business impacts? Do you want to be part of history that is transforming the world? Would you like a career path that enables you to learn and progress with highly motivated, fun-loving, and skilled colleagues? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is looking for highly skilled and motivated Big Data & Analytics Solutions Architect to help accelerate the growth of our customers' businesses in Vietnam and ASEAN. You would be part of a dynamic team bringing the latest in disruptive, Cloud Computing and Big Data technologies to enable leaders that want to serve customers more effectively. You will have the opportunity to shape and deliver on a strategy to help customers better leverage AWS Data & Analytics platforms to meet their innovation goals. Expertise in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIML) is a bonus, as you will be expected to leverage these technologies to extract maximum value from the data and help our customers drive innovation. Amazon strives to be the most customer-centric company on earth. The ideal candidate will: Enjoy working with customers and partners. You will have a passion for educating, training, designing, and building Big Data & Analytics cloud computing systems for some of the largest and most important accounts to drive efficiencies and increase innovation. You will enjoy keeping your existing technical skills and developing new ones, enabling you to lead deep Big Data & Analytics architecture discussions. You will have experience in applying Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning techniques to solve complex data challenges and drive business impact. You will be happy to roll up your sleeves, learn the deep details of AWS systems, and generally do what it takes to achieve technical success for customers on the AWS platform. You will develop and run technical content, prove our technology through mechanisms like demonstrations, proof-of-concepts. You will guide technical teams in our customers on the best practices in architecting Big Data systems. As the right candidate, you will love what you do, and instinctively know how to make work fun. You will be dynamic and creative, and willing to take on any challenge.  AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services. Key job responsibilities Collaborate with AWS field sales, Solution Architects, training and support teams to help partners and customers learn and understand the capabilities and value of AWS Big Data and Analytics services such as AWS Glue, Amazon Elastic Map Reduce (EMR), Amazon Redshift, Amazon Athena & Amazon Kinesis, in addition to other offerings that form the Data & Analytics ecosystem. Deliver on-site technical engagements with partners and customers. This includes participating in pre-sales on-site visits, understanding customer requirements, creating consulting proposals and designing relevant data solutions. Push the envelope – Cloud computing is reducing the historical “IT constraint” on businesses. Imagine bold possibilities and work with our clients and partners to find innovative new ways to satisfy business needs through Data / Business Intelligence / Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence / Generative AI cloud computing. Build the Community – Develop and cultivate a community of Big Data & Analytics experts, sharing ideas and best practices. Coordinate efforts around IP development, evangelism and thought-leadership events relating to Big Data & Analytics. Provide thought leadership to Data & Analytics experts both externally through events like AWS Summit Series and User-Groups. Work with AWS engineering and support teams to convey partner and customer needs and feedback as input to technology roadmaps. Share real world implementation challenges and recommend new capabilities that would simplify adoption and drive greater value from use of AWS cloud services.  The candidate will possess both technical and customer-facing skills that will allow them to be a "trusted advisor" to customers. They will be able to facilitate relationships with senior personnel, as well as easily interact and give guidance to database experts, software developers, IT pros, and system architects. The ideal candidate will also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges. If you are someone who enjoys innovating, likes diving deep, solving hard problems and working on cutting edge technology, we would love to have you on the team. About the team  Diverse Experiences  Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying. Why AWS  Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Work/Life Balance  We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud. Inclusive Team Culture  Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness. Mentorship and Career Growth  We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.  An advanced degree in computer science, MIS, engineering or a related discipline Hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) data and analytics services, including expertise in architecting and deploying scalable, secure, and highly available solutions. Proven track record of driving innovation and thought leadership in the fields of Big Data processing, data warehousing, data governance, and advanced analytics, including the application of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. Deep understanding of data ecosystems, including application, server, and network security, as well as data privacy and compliance regulations. Experience with statistics, mathematical modelling, and the practical application of predictive analytics and data science techniques to solve complex business problems.

Microsoft@Software Engineer.job_description: Microsoft 365 (M365) provides the world’s leading modern workspace cloud services, empowering communication, collaboration, and productivity. It is trusted by hundreds of millions of users worldwide and in enterprise clouds. The M365 Messaging (Transport) service, a crucial component of this system, delivers and handles billions of messages daily. The M365 Messaging (Transport) team is instrumental in upholding the high standards of performance and reliability that users have come to expect from our email and Teams messages. We are a group of dedicated professionals who are passionate about delivering low-latency messaging solutions and maintaining the robust infrastructure required for our world-class services. We are on the lookout for individuals who share our enthusiasm for messaging technology and have a drive to contribute to a team that is shaping the future of communication in the digital workspace. As a member of the M365 Messaging (Transport) team, you will be immersed in a culture that values diversity, inclusivity, and a relentless pursuit of excellence. Join us in our quest to refine and advance the messaging capabilities of M365, and take part in an exciting journey that influences how the world communicates and collaborates. Your expertise and vision could play a crucial role in driving Microsoft's ongoing success in cloud services. Responsibilities  Building distributed, highly available and resilient systems Analyzing, designing and implementing Messaging system, and ensure the highest code quality and performance Working with services spanning thousands of servers, doing tens of billions of messaging transactions and serving hundreds of millions of users Collaborate with peer engineers, partner teams, and program managers across the Worldwide to deliver cutting-edge cloud technology. Qualifications  Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Technology, or related fields. Minimum of 1 year of work experience; proficiency in English communication is preferred. Strong programming skills, with familiarity in at least one object-oriented programming language such as C#, C++, Python, or Java. Excellent design and data analysis skills, with a passion for product quality, performance, and engineering excellence. Exceptional learning, collaboration, and innovation skills, along with the ability to take responsibility and solve problems independently.  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Pizza 4P’s@Software Engineer (Full-stack.job_description: About 4P’s We’re so excited that you’re considering becoming a Partner with Pizza 4P’s! Our Vision is to Make The World Smile for Peace and we do that by Delivering Wow and Sharing Happiness.  We know that to accomplish this Vision and Mission it all starts with you. So if this sings to your heart then come grow with us. Software Engineer Front-End Developer  As a Full-Stack Front-End Developer at Pizza 4P‘s, you will play a crucial role in developing, maintaining, and enhancing our digital platforms, including web and mobile applications. Your primary focus will be on creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces, employing cutting-edge technologies to deliver high-quality software solutions that align with our business objectives.  Responsibilities:  Front-End Development:  Develop responsive and user-friendly web and mobile applications, focusing on front-end development. Utilize technologies such as ASP.NET, JavaScript, Svelte, SvelteKit, and ReactJS to create interactive and engaging user interfaces.  AI, IoT, and Service Cloud Integration:  Collaborate with AI specialists to enhance customer experiences through personalized recommendations and chatbots. Work with IoT devices and sensors to collect and analyze data for improved operational efficiency.  Database Integration:  Design and integrate databases, including PostgreSQL and MongoDB, to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval.  Solution Design:  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions that align with the project‘s goals.  Coding and Implementation:  Write high-quality, maintainable code using best practices and design patterns. Implement new features, functionality, and improvements to existing applications.  Testing and Quality Assurance:  Develop and execute test plans, including unit tests and UI testing, to ensure software reliability and performance. Debug and resolve issues, optimizing application performance and security.  Cross-Platform Development:  Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android using Flutter to ensure a consistent user experience.  User Interface and User Experience (UI/UX):  Collaborate with designers to create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces.  Documentation and Reporting:  Maintain detailed technical documentation, including code comments and development guidelines.  Continuous Learning and Innovation:  Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends in front-end development.  Requirements:  Bachelor‘s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master‘s degree preferred). Proven experience as a Full-Stack Front-End Developer with a minimum of 3 years of experience in front-end development. Expertise in ASP.NET, JavaScript, Svelte, SvelteKit, ReactJS, and Flutter. Strong knowledge of software architecture, design patterns, and best practices. Experience with UI/UX design and optimization. Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills. Effective communication and collaboration skills. Ability to work in an agile development environment. Lương:  Thương lượng  Địa chỉ:  Pizza 4P‘s Ho Chi Minh Phòng ban:  Head Office (Non-managerial Level)  Hạn nộp hồ sơ:  01/07 — 31/08/2024

GFT Technologies SE@Senior Data Engineer.job_description: What do we do? As a pioneer for digital transformation GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies – from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as in the manufacturing industry. Through the intelligent use of IT solutions GFT increases productivity and creates added value for clients. Companies gain easy and safe access to scalable IT-applications and innovative business models.Who are we? Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world’s largest and best-known Banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‘Great place to work’ in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization this position could be right for you.Role Summary: We are seeking a highly motivated Senior Data Engineer with minimum of 8 years of experience to join our dynamic data engineering team. As a Senior Data Engineer at GFT, you will play a pivotal role in designing, maintaining, and enhancing various analytical and operational services and infrastructure crucial for the organization's functions. You'll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless flow of data for critical decision-making processes.Key Activities:  Data Infrastructure Design and Maintenance: Architect, maintain, and enhance analytical and operational services and infrastructure, including data lakes, databases, data pipelines, and metadata repositories, to ensure accurate and timely delivery of actionable insights. Collaboration: Work closely with data science teams to design and implement data schemas and models, integrate new data sources with product teams, and collaborate with other data engineers to implement cutting-edge technologies in the data space. Data Processing: Develop and optimize large-scale batch and real-time data processing systems to support the organization's growth and improvement initiatives. Workflow Management: Utilize workflow scheduling and monitoring tools like Apache Airflow and AWS Batch to ensure efficient data processing and management. Quality Assurance: Implement robust testing strategies to ensure the reliability and usability of data processing systems. Continuous Improvement: Stay abreast of emerging technologies and best practices in data engineering, and propose and implement optimizations to enhance development efficiency.  Required Skills:  Technical Expertise: Proficient in Unix environments, distributed and cloud computing, Python frameworks (e.g., pandas, pyspark), version control systems (e.g., git), and workflow scheduling tools (e.g., Apache Airflow). Database Proficiency: Experience with columnar and big data databases like Athena, Redshift, Vertica, and Hive/Hadoop. Cloud Services: Familiarity with AWS or other cloud services like Glue, EMR, EC2, S3, Lambda, etc. Containerization: Experience with container management and orchestration tools like Docker, ECS, and Kubernetes. CI/CD: Knowledge of CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, CircleCI, or AWS CodePipeline.  Nice-to-have requirements:  Programming Languages: Familiarity with JVM languages like Java or Scala. Database Technologies: Experience with RDBMS (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., DynamoDB, Redis). BI Tools: Exposure to enterprise BI tools like Tableau, Looker, or PowerBI. Data Science Environments: Understanding of data science environments like AWS Sagemaker or Databricks. Monitoring and Logging: Knowledge of log ingestion and monitoring tools like ELK stack or Datadog. Data Privacy and Security: Understanding of data privacy and security tools and concepts. Messaging Systems: Familiarity with distributed messaging and event streaming systems like Kafka or RabbitMQ.  What can we offer you?  Competitive salary 13th-month salary guarantee Performance bonus Professional English course for employees Premium health insurance Extensive annual leave  About Us  We show commitment to our investors and stand for solid, long-term growth performance. Founded in Germany in 1987 and in American territory since 2008, GFT expanded globally to over 10,000 experts. And to more than 15 markets to ensure proximity to clients. With new opportunities from Asia to Brazil, the international growth story continues. We are committed to grow tech talents worldwide. Because our team’s strong consulting and development skills across legacy and pioneering technologies, like GreenCoding, underpin success. We maintain a family atmosphere in an inclusive work environment.  Why Choose GFT?  Competitive Compensation Benefits package including comprehensive medical, dental, vision and others Company Culture based on our Core Values Professional Development Training with Individual Development Plans to map out your career growth Opportunity to work in a global environment with diverse teams built with colleagues from around the world Opportunity to work with technology industry leaders in the financial services industry Opportunity to work for big name clients in capital markets, banking and other industries

Considered a leader in structural systems research, testing and innovation, Simpson Strong-Tie is one of the largest suppliers of structural building products in the world where we value all members and the creativity that individuals can bring to the workplace. We work as a team, grow together with quality and customer-focused mindset, collaborative spirit in order to achieve the organizational goals.  BE A MAKER  At Simpson Strong-Tie, we've built a workplace where people are connected and engaged in creative thinking from day one throughout their careers. When you think of the best a family has to offer — support, collaboration and respect — that's what we value at Simpson Strong-Tie. When there's a win, we'll cheer you on. When there's a snag, coworkers step in to help you out. Working on solutions together is just the way we do things here, and that creates an atmosphere that often feels like home. At Simpson Strong-Tie, you'll find talented, passionate, dedicated, humble and genuinely kind people who are all connected by our shared mission — to provide solutions that help people design and build safer, stronger structures. It's this mission and our strong people-focused values that have made Simpson Strong-Tie a unique place to work for more than 60 years — a place where you can connect, create and build your career. We invite you to learn more about our culture and why our employees are our most loyal customers.  YOU  You want to be an important member of a strong team of other makers who take pride in their work and support each other. GreenFeed@IoT and Automation Manager.job_description: Nơi Làm Việc  Hồ Chí Minh (Quận 3)  Cấp Bậc  Quản lý Hình Thức  Nhân viên chính thức Kinh nghiệm  5 - 8 Năm Mức Lương  Lương thỏa thuận Ngành nghề  CNTT - Phần mềm, CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng, Nông nghiệp Phòng Ban  Công nghệ thông tin Hạn Chót Nhận Hồ Sơ  31/08/2024Mô Tả Công Việc  Company Overview GREENFEED has been among agriculture leaders in Vietnam for nearly two decades. The company’s mission is to provide consumers with a clean food chain from farm to table by continuously improving its “3F plus”—feed, farm, and food—process. Today, GREENFEED manages numerous farms, animal feed facilities, and food production factories, with a distribution network across Vietnam and Southeast Asia. Position Overview As a manager of IoT and Automation, you will play a key role in the management and implementation of IoT and Automation projects. Specifically, you will be responsible for working with stakeholders to understand requirements from which to propose, design, develop, and deploy IoT systems that help to improve the productivity, reliability, effectiveness, and efficiency of the business. It’s important that you are responsible for the project spending according to the approved budget. Beside project management, you will be working with cross-functional teams to optimize operations and make continuous improvements for the company. Finally, you are expected to build, train, and develop manpower for the team, the company, as well as customers. Key responsibilities Below are key responsibilities of the job  Design IoT Solutions: tailor IoT solutions to meet specific business needs, considering factors such as data collection, network connectivity, data analysis, and data security. Deploy IoT Devices: choose appropriate IoT devices (e.g., sensors, actuators) and connect them with operational equipment and machines to gather real-time data on performance, quality, and environmental conditions. Develop IoT Platforms: collaborate with software engineers to create custom IoT applications and platforms tailored to manufacturing operations, including controls, visualization tools, and reporting mechanisms. Integrate IoT Platforms with Other Systems: integrate IoT applications with other systems such as Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) or Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) for continuous data exchange and improved production processes. Manage IoT Data: develop protocols and systems to collect and store large volumes of IoT-generated data, ensuring its integrity, security and accessibility. Analyze IoT Data: utilize data analytics tools and techniques to derive actionable insights for decision-making, enabling predictive maintenance, process optimization, and quality control. Drive Continuous Improvement: lead initiatives to enhance IoT systems and processes by gathering stakeholder feedback and monitoring industry trends and best practices. Ensure Compliance & Standards: adhere to relevant industry standards, regulations, and cybersecurity requirements throughout the design and implementation of IoT solutions. Provide Documentation & Training: create technical documentation, user manuals, and training materials to facilitate the deployment and maintenance of IoT systems, fostering knowledge transfer and skill development within the organization.Yêu Cầu Công Việc  Mandatory requirements for the job are as follows  Bachelor’s or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or related fields. Minimum 5 years of working experience in the manufacturing field, IoT and Automation. Proven experience in the design and implementation of IoT and Automation systems, sensor integration, data acquisition systems and industrial communication protocols. Proficient in implementing automation solutions with PLC, HMI, and SCADA platforms Familiar with cybersecurity principles and best practices applying to IoT systems Familiar with embedded systems and embedded systems programming Familiar with Visual Studio and C# Knowledge of IoT technologies, protocols and standards (e.g., MQTT, OPC, UA, Modbus). Paradox@Data Architect.job_description: Are you passionate about shaping data architecture and unlocking the power of data at Paradox? We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Data Architect to join our team and play a pivotal role in orchestrating the design, implementation, and ongoing management of our data architecture.This role presents an exciting opportunity to work at the forefront of data-driven innovation at Paradox. You will collaborate closely with key stakeholders across the organization to ensure our data strategies align with Paradox's overarching objectives. Additionally, you will be responsible for driving enterprise data management initiatives, implementing robust data governance frameworks, and ensuring data quality, security, and compliance.As a Data Architect, your responsibilities will be:  Data Strategy:  Collaborate with key stakeholders across Paradox to understand business requirements, data needs, and strategic goals. Develop and implement a comprehensive data strategy aligned with Paradox's objectives. Conduct in-depth analysis of the existing data landscape, including data sources, data quality, and data governance practices. Identify and assess opportunities for data-driven improvement across various business units. Develop data governance policies and procedures to ensure data integrity, security, and compliance.Data Architecture Design and Implementation:  Design, develop, and maintain a scalable, secure, and reliable data architecture that supports Paradox's needs. Evaluate and recommend appropriate data platforms, technologies, and tools based on Paradox's needs. Design and implement data pipelines and data lakes. Lead the design and implementation of data warehouses and data hubs. Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure integration of data architecture with existing systems and applications.Data Modeling and Management:  Create and maintain reference and solution architecture blueprints, data models, and information flow diagrams. Implement standard processes for data modeling and database design. Develop and maintain conceptual, logical, and physical data models. Implement data quality management processes to ensure data integrity and consistency. Design and implement data security and access controls. Collaborate with data engineers, analysts, and scientists to define data requirements and specifications. Develop and implement data documentation and metadata standards.Data Governance and Compliance:  Implement and support data frameworks, policies, and standards to ensure data quality, security, and compliance. Collaborate with legal and compliance teams to ensure adherence to relevant regulations and data privacy laws. Develop and implement data lineage tracking and reporting processes.Leadership and Collaboration:  Foster a collaborative data culture within Paradox. Communicate effectively with stakeholders across different levels of the organization. Present data architecture proposals and recommendations to senior management. Stay informed about emerging trends and technologies in the data architecture landscape. Experience & Skills Required:  6+ years of experience as a Data Architect or a similar role. Proven track record of designing and implementing data architectures for complex B2B SaaS organizations. Strong SQL skills and familiarity with database management systems. Knowledgeable on big data and NoSQL databases. Proven expertise in formulating and implementing robust data frameworks, tools, and processes. This includes data cataloging, data classifications, data quality, lineage, security, privacy, compliance, and more. Strong expertise in data modeling principles, methodologies, and tools. In-depth understanding of data governance best practices and regulatory requirements. Experience working with various data platforms and technologies (e.g., cloud platforms, data lakes, data warehouses, ETL/ELT tools). Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Excellent English skills. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. Master's degree in Data Science, Business Intelligence, or related field highly preferred. Why You Should Work at Paradox:  - Work side by side with a global team of passionate and purposeful people - Talent is our DNA and we pride ourselves on having the best!  Develop amazing products to serve clients who are leading corporations around the world. Ability to make a big impact on a growing organization and drive your own career. Professional development opportunities. Benefits package including: Competitive performance-based salary, annual performance bonus, and 13th-month salary bonus;  Annual salary review;  Healthcare package with annual health check-up and premium medical insurance;  Free lunch;  Petrol allowance;  House allowance;  In-house English class;  Family Care package with medical insurance and child care allowance;  Loyalty bonus plan;  And heaps of internal events and team buildings to enjoy.

Anduin Transactions@Software Engineer, P.job_description: The private capital market hosts $14 trillion of investment that funds massive innovation around the world; yet much of it still operates on manual processes and fragmented legacy systems. Think of the New York City subway system running on analog machines!  Anduin’s mission is to revolutionize investing in the alts and empower LP-GP relationships by building better workflows, data processes, and technology integrations. Our award-winning products, Fund Subscription, Data Room, and Investor Access, have raised almost $102 billion in capital across 40,000+ investors for venture capital, private equity, and hedge funds. In 2023, nearly 5% of all global capital raised was through Anduin, and we’re just getting started!  Since our founding in 2014, we’ve brought together deep private market expertise with leading technologists. Our world-class team has grown to over 140+ talented individuals across Asia, Canada, Europe, and the US all focused on transforming private market transactions.  Anduin is looking for Software Engineers, Product development, who want to move fast, and to be the first to solve intractable real world problems. We empower our engineers to own the vision and make it 10x bigger. We want our people to be bold, to dream big, to take risks and to learn from trying (and failing).  Job Responsibilities:You have the will and grit to push past tough obstacles and help build an important company from the ground up. You have the curiosity to explore domains outside your own and the instinct to leverage radical solutions to make our users successful. You obsess over software performance and constantly challenge yourself and others to deliver highly scalable, low latency, reliable and fast computation platforms. You maintain a high bar for coding excellence and a passion for design and architecture. Collaborate with products, designers, QAs, and Customer Success teams across the company to bring the best of the breed features and experience to our customers. Our technology stack: Akka, Scala, Docker, FoundationDB, AWS, Scala.js and React.js.  Job Qualifications:  Must have:  Experience designing, building, deploying, operating, scaling, and evolving distributed systems and high-volume transaction application.  End-to-end knowledge of modern web app architecture (including databases, API design, cloud infrastructure, and security) as well as best development practices.  Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related fields or equivalent work experience.  Excellent verbal communication skills.Nice to have:  Full-stack development experience.  Large AWS deployment experience.  Proficiency in a Unix/Linux environment.  Graduate degree (MS/PhD or PhD dropped out) or competitive programming background a plus.

Hello Health Group Pte. Ltd@VP of Tech.ID: Hello Health Group Pte. Ltd@VP of Tech
Hello Health Group Pte. Ltd@VP of Tech.job_description: Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam  Posted on 2023-11-27 16:04:19 · 7 applicantsNegotiableFull-timeDirectorKey Responsibilities:Technology Vision  You’ll establish the company’s technical vision and lead all aspects of the company’s technological development. You’ll architect the entire technical strategy for Hello Health. You’ll direct the company’s strategic direction, development and future growth. You’ll conduct research and case studies on leading edge technologies and make determinations on the probability of implementation. You’ll act as a good steward of Hello Health Group resources and ensure control of Technology departmental budgets. You’ll supervise system infrastructure to ensure functionality and efficiency You’ll act as a mentor to the technology team members You’ll show hands on approach to solve problems  Design and Development/Strategy  The VP of Tech plays a leadership role in the engineering department where he/she seeks excellence in all engineering disciplines inclusive of data processing, quality assurance, application development, analytics, machine learning, algorithms, and data warehousing. In this position, the VP of Tech manages the day-to-day activities of the engineering teams as well as the management and execution of site/software development projects against delivery commitments and project plans. You’re also in charge of the management of the department’s staffing, resources, and mentoring, and maintaining a best-in-class engineering department. The VP of Tech leads the engineering team in the delivery of platform functionality through a mix of development software and helps the team in achieving and surpassing departmental goals. He/she provides technical guidance and direction, as well as hands-on resource and project management, for all site/software development activities. He/she takes the lead with a profound understanding of new and relevant technologies for the purpose of realizing efficiency. He/she ensures the optimal application of engineering resources in order to meet product development and consumer requirements and ensures the implementation of agile processes that support site/software development processes. The VP of Tech plays a leading role in the recruiting activities of the engineering department in order to ensure consistency in departmental efficiency. You’ll also play a mentorship role to key engineering personnel, assisting in their duties upon request, and constantly promoting the growth of their professional skills, readying them for the assumption of his/her duties in his absence or retirement. The VP of Tech also plays a leading engineering role within the department where he/she is tasked with the planning, management, execution and implementation of site/software projects, inclusive of the day-to-day project management, scope management, issue and risk management, as well as regular status reporting In this capacity, the VP of Tech develops strategic plans with regard to the technical development of sites/software and establishes the business’s technical vision that guides all aspects of technological development. He/she also oversees the strategic deployment of the departmental resources leading to optimal resource allocation and the smooth and successful development of sites/software. The VP of Tech , in this capacity is responsible for the overall system development life-cycle.  Collaboration/Support  The role of the VP of Tech is also a highly collaborative one. The VP of Tech will work closely with senior engineering teams in the management and development of strategic planning. He/she will also work closely with the user experience department in designing, developing, and deploying scalable technologies that will lead to increased consumer satisfaction. The VP of Tech also works with senior engineering management in ensuring that systems meet the overall business requirements and standards.  People and Performance Management  Acts as a good steward of Hello Health Group resources and ensures control of Technology departmental budgets. You ensure the Hello Health Group Core Values, our Purpose and Mission are exemplified in your own behavior and brought to life by your team. You fully commit to and implement Performance Management in line with company policy, engaging and leading individuals and the team effectively to meet company goals. You ensure that all team members have updated Job Descriptions, MBOs and are fully aware of the expectations of their role and responsibilities. You hold regular performance 1 on 1 reviews with direct reports to ensure high levels of staff engagement and delivery on KPIs. You actively identify and address the development needs of your team, utilize the learning opportunities available to them, ensuring your team maximize their own learning by making use of HHG’s offerings such as the HHG Academy. You partner with the HR team to ensure that company policies are implemented and that all employment contracts and practices are compliant with local labor laws. You attract, recruit, retain and develop staff to position Hello Health as an employer of choice in your country. Who We Want: Proven experience as a Tech Lead/Head of Engineering/VP of Tech /VP of Technology or similar leadership role. Knowledge of technological trends to build a strategy. Understanding of budgets and business-planning. Ability to conduct technological analyses and research. Advanced English language is mandatory. Leadership and organizational abilities. Strategic thinking. Problem-solving attitude. BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field. Backend development: PHP, Laravel Framework 5.3+, Golang. Frontend development: React JS + Next.js, HTML, CSS (bootstrap). Database: SQL and relational database management, specifically MySQL, NOSQL like MongoDB. Knowledge about Unix, Linux server, Nginx , Apach. Frameworks and Architecture: CI, Yii, Lumen, Laravel, WordPress, Strapi, Express, Koa, VueJs + Nuxt, React + Next, Gastby, MVC, SOA, Microservice, CI/CD with Jenkins and AWS, Elastic search. Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Kubernete.  What Hello Health Group Offers:We are passionate individuals that are driven to succeed. Our work culture is characterized by strong team spirit, high degrees of openness and innovation, and strong collaboration across fields. We love the freedom of an entrepreneurial company and are looking for like-minded, ambitious professionals who have a desire to build something new and actively support our young company in its growth to greatness.  You will love working here!  Competitive salary package Professional and open working environment–culturally integrating the best of Western and Southeast Asian cultures to take the best of each and ensure we build an energetic, commercial, and fun working atmosphere. Opportunities to improve English skills within an international team–English is the official language in all Hello Health offices.  Do you think you’ve got what it takes? !

Elfie@Sr. Data Engineer.job_description: ABOUT THE ROLE Are you business-minded and passionate about turning data into actionable insights? Do you have senior operational and strategic data engineering experience? Join us today as our Sr. Data Engineer! In this role, you’ll collaborate globally, design analytics products, and uncover valuable trends. From optimising user engagement to enhancing product performance, your expertise and impact will drive Elfie’s mission of improving patient lives.  Data@Elfie By the end of 2024, Elfie will have onboarded 1,000,000 users. Our anonymized data is already valuable for life science companies as well as insurance companies: they are keen to learn how to improve people's health for medical and economic purposes. WHAT WE OFFER  A permanent global contract, with fiercely competitive salaryHybrid working - three days in the office and two days at home in Singapore Annual holiday entitlement plus national holidays off Private healthcare enrollment or budget for obtaining your own Performance-related bonus paid twice a year; April and OctoberWork out of our HQ. Modern WeWork offices where you’ll get…Free tea, coffee, snacks and free BEER ON TAP! (after 5pm of course) Brand new Macbook Pro and associated tech on day oneAn inclusive culture where everybody in the business has direct impact  WHAT YOU’LL DO Support our clients and stakeholders:  Implement dashboards and reports measuring the application's performance and health impact, Structure the models and tables to optimise visualisation performance, ease of use and flexibility of the reportsHelp to Ensure the quality and relevancy of our Demo datas in our environmentsContribute to our Machine Learning software to predict health events and patient behaviours.  Data Governance  Ensure data and dashboards consistency Define and check all required controls on the input formats of the datas we receive (from patient or third parties)Define and propose data migration when relevant on historical data to maintain consistency and data qualityDefine data schemas and consistent naming conventions to ensure maintainability of the solution,Ensure data integrity and security by defining relevant user permissions (internal and external users), and not collecting nor exposing unnecessary data,Collaborate with engineering team (frontend and backend developers) to collect relevant data from the application and third parties solutionsEnsure all Data glossaries are up to date  Data integration  Maintain and review the APIs that we use to integrate data from our partners (hospitals, pharmacies, insurers),Define, Build and manage the APIs and Datasets that we expose to our clients and partners,Ensure performance, quality, security of the data receive and sent to our clients and partners,Define & implement cost-efficient data analytics pipelines and storage solutions, leveraging Google Cloud Platform data solutions in particular  WHAT YOU’LL NEED  7+ years of experience in data engineering focused positions with international exposure Proven experience of in-app analytics with hands-on experience with main vendors (Looker Studio, PowerBI, or other BI tool possibly integrated with AI)Focused on details and also able to understand the overall picture and the meaning of consolidated dataExpert in SQLProven experience of building data pipelines / ETL and designing dashboardsFamiliar with GCP data solutions: Data Studio, BigQuery, Firestore extensions, GA, IAMProven experience in statistical modelling using mainstream software and languages (R, Python, SAS, SPSS...)  WHY JOIN US?  Strong and genuinely patient-focused company mission (see below)Excellent financial credibility and refreshingly transparent future visionPhenomenal growth plans and an excellent team cultureExperienced founders with 20+ years experience in digital health, software and partnership development in both bluechip and start-up companies - and successful previous exits!   ABOUT ELFIE Check out the Elfie app:  for Android: https://links.elfie.co/apptesterfor iOS: https://links.elfie.co/testflight-i  Elfie is the first completely free, gamified mobile app that rewards users for monitoring their health. Our vision is to become the world's largest self-reported medical record platform, supporting all therapeutic areas in a single, gamified, and free app for maximum impact. We have a footprint in 7 countries (Brazil, France, United Kingdom, Turkey, Egypt, Hong Kong, Singapore and Vietnam), growing to 12 by the end of 2024 and 25 by the end of 2025. How do we monetize? We have 2 independent yet synergic business models: 1. Pharmaceutical companies: Elfie free application is sponsored by pharmaceutical companies, who need to drive treatment adherence and access anonymized real-world data. Pharmaceutical companies cover our company operational costs and the promotion of the application. 1. Insurers and employers: Elfie premium version (aka ElfieWorks) is an employee health program sponsored by employers and insurers. These companies need employees to stay in good health and engaged to increase productivity and keep ever-increasing healthcare costs under control.  ElfieWorks is designed and distributed in partnership with a global insurance broker and partner insurers. What is our culture? We have one single NorthStar at Elfie: maximising global health impact. It is a measurable KPI that is a function of the number of lives impacted and the level of impact on each individual. Everybody KPIs across all departments are aligned with this. All our partnerships and revenue streams are also aligned with this. We have 4 values:   Patient-first. Whatever goes against our North Star (maximising patient health impact) is eliminated, all ideas and projects are prioritised accordingly.Think big. We don’t allow our fears and unknowns to limit our ambition and solutions. Take ownership. We are not tasked to execute a process but responsible to find a scalable solution.Resilience. We don’t allow challenges and set-backs to lower our motivation and commitment to our mission, regardless of the personal discomfort it means.  What does “Data” mean at Elfie? We use data in 3 ways: 1. We use data to target and onboard the right users and to engage them towards health-related behavioural changes.  2. We use data to improve our product ability to support as many persons as possible and to be the most impactful in each domain and therapeutic area. 3. We use anonymized data (aka RWE) to support life science research and public health policies. WHAT NOW? Apply today for immediate consideration!  Know someone who would be a good fit for this role? We’re offering a monetary reward if you refer them to us and they are successful! Contact the Talent Acquisition team for more information: aaron@elfie.co Job Type: Full-time

TikTok@TikTok Shop - Creator Governance.job: TikTok Shop - Creator Governance Strategy Manager - Analytics & Policy
TikTok@TikTok Shop - Creator Governance.job_description: Responsibilities  TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. Why Join Us  Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.  Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.  To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.  At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.  Join us. The E-Commerce team seeks to further advance this mission by connecting buyers, sellers and content creators in one seamless, trusted online shopping experience. The APAC Ecommerce's Governance and Experience team connects buyers, sellers and content creators to ensure a seamless, trusted online shopping experience. We seek to inspire trust by designing and implementing end-to-end governance & experience programmes to enable a thriving international marketplace. As a Creator Governance Strategy manager, you will analyse metrics, perform analytics, develop policies, and drive operational optimisation to improve users' live-shopping experience. You are a systems-thinker, highly data-driven and can develop strategic roadmaps to govern creators' live-selling performance across their lifecycle: from onboarding and commission control, through their participation in key business events such as campaigns and advertisements, to incentive programmes. To keep our live-shopping ecosystem healthy, you will define scenarios and creator behaviours we want to encourage and do not welcome. You know how to measure these behaviours, set targets, and develop policies to reduce poor quality content and adversarial actors, as well as improve live-selling content ecosystem quality. Responsibilities  1. Develop data-driven strategies and policies to evaluate and manage creators' account health, violations, rewards, penalties, as well as their live-streaming performance. Manage go-to-market to ensure effective implementation across Asia Pacific and policy and project outcomes are met  2. Conduct actionable data analyses to measure, identify, mitigate, and monitor risks to raise the overall ecommerce content ecosystem quality and personalised recommendations. Develop and implement new signals, metrics and risks prioritisation – to monitor and identify new content quality and abuse trends from large datasets  3. Engage cross-functional stakeholders to consolidate, pre-empt and analyse content and creator governance pain points; derive and implement action plans and operational workflows to resolve them  4. Develop, launch and implement new policies and operational workflows – in collaboration with cross-functional teams like Engineering, Operations, Moderation, Product, and Policy – to enhance large-scale automation, risk detection and mitigation, as well as quality assurance and improvements  5. Develop and implement feedback loops and operational workflows to ensure the day-to-day quality of launches and implementation  6. Implement and review dashboards and cases as needed, to ensure day-to-day ecosystem health  7. Act as an escalation point of contact and manage internal communications on all creator governance issues  Qualifications  1. Strong bachelor's degree in a quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics, data analytics; computer science, engineering etc  2. 5+ years experience running programmes and developing policies, with hands-on experience with data analytics (e.g., SQL, Python) and segmentation on large data sets. Data analysis is required in this role  3. Professional experience in Strategy or Operations Management Consulting, Business Intelligence, Business Analytics, Platform Governance, Trust and Safety Policymaking and Operations Management, or Ecommerce Strategy, Seller or Product Growth, Risk Analytics, Compliance, or Experience programmes  4. Driven, excellent programme management and communication skills with the ability to plan for, and manage complex projects, as well as influence multiple cross-functional teams to build and launch new strategies and workflows  5. Familiarity with e-commerce compliance and ecosystem management – as well as strategic business sensitivity – will be advantageous  6. Familiarity with SEA e-commerce and/or social media content landscape will be advantageous TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too

As a Data Product Manager at Cho Tot, you are accountable for delivering impactful solutions, insights, key learnings, and optimizing features to drive the best performance of Chotot products overall. Collaborate with Product Managers across verticals and functions to enable data-informed decision-making, contributing data perspectives to define optimal product roadmaps and strategies.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, marketing, and sales, to implement and evaluate product initiatives. The implementations should advance compliance with legal forms of data use as well as support business use of data; Work to align advanced technologies and review technical implementation details and design documentation for new systems and features to ensure compliance with Privacy by Design principles from the first stages of development and ensure that the data use meets established regulatory compliance needs such as Decree 13/2023 & Decree 53/2022; Analyze, design and program software enhancements for new data streams with a goal of developing technical solutions and systems to help mitigate privacy vulnerabilities and prevent potential future privacy risks; Understanding the process of creating solid design, coding, testing and debugging as well as completing documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance interface user-facing privacy controls; Use access control, data anonymization, pseudonimization and encryption to develop systems that preserve and improve data privacy, data protection, data usability, performance and the integrity of the privacy solution; Performs regular privacy assessments of operational processes, identifying, and mitigating risks across the company through effective tools, training and guidance; Work cross with data science and analytics communities both within and outside of the organization. Bayer@Sr. Business Designer.job_description: Sr. Business Designer MAIN JOB PURPOSE:Venture building has been described as the next frontier to drive corporate innovation. The DFS Asia team functions like a fast-growing startup within Bayer in order to rapidly develop new business models with the goal of capturing new customers and market segments. We are on a mission to accelerate the digital farming ecosystem across Asia to empower small holder farmers. In order to achieve this vision, we need to put small holder farmers at the centre of our product development and venture building process.We are currently strengthening the Business Design team to spearhead the human-centred-design approach within DFS Bayer Crop Science, Asia. We are looking for design champions who are passionate about solving some of the biggest problem in the agriculture industry. The Senior Business designer will help our team design value proposition for our digital products and putting small holder farmers and other agriculture stakeholders at the core of what we are building. The role will be based in Vietnam.This is a rare opportunity to work for one of the top Fortune 500 companies while enjoying the experience of a startup environment.YOUR TASKS & RESPONSIBILITIES: Working with colleagues across Asia to support their Business Design needs Facilitate design sprints and workshops with heterogeneous groups of clients and stakeholders Support our Venture Leads when it comes to organizing virtual design sprints with wider APAC colleagues or running workshops with local colleagues and small holder farmers. Recommend Business Design best practice and the right design methodologies. To contextualize the demand and help define the need of small holder farmers. This will help to inform our digital product development process. To personalize the design approach and elaborate tailor-made specifications to support our ventures located in different countries To facilitate the internal Bayer communication to decompartmentalize the services or stakeholders involved in the realization of the project Manage user research and Business Design process, drive decisions, track issues, and assist in estimating resource, needs and schedules. Collaborate with product owners and leaders to drive product strategy and the development roadmap. Plan and manage the design research activities (research strategy, ethnographic based user research, secondary research, UX research…) collaboratively with the team. Plan and execute system mapping, customer journeys, scenarios and service specifications. Analyze research data identifying and generating meaningful insights and behavioral patterns. Training Junior Business designers and help our Product Design team to understand Business Design principles  WHO YOU ARE: 5+ years of relevant experience Experience in working on a broad range of research and innovation-oriented projects Excellent presentation and communication skills, both written and verbal. (fluency in English and Vietnamese is a must) Experience with high-level stakeholders’ engagement. Strong interpersonal and client management skills.  Experience with mentoring and elevating other creative people into Business Design thinking. Experience in conducting and synthesizing research, insights and findings. Experience in structuring and visualizing journey maps, service ideation, concept communication and specification. A hands-on Senior Business designer with skills in visual / interaction design as well. Excellent portfolio showcasing design solutions and strategic approaches. Ability to facilitate workshops, set design sprints and hold seminars and training sessions. Knowledge of agile approaches and techniques. Ability to communicate effectively with different audiences. A solid competency in storytelling and public speaking. You are comfortable explaining your ideas to client stakeholders and to ideate the best means to present your conceptual work. Attention to details and organizational approach. Ability to understand the impact of technology on design deliverables.
